title: (Alteration of Name of Department and Title of Minister) Order 2023 (S.I. No.
heading: 2. Regulation 11A of Oireachtas (Allowances and Facilities) Regulations (
text_raw:
2. Regulation 11A of Oireachtas (Allowances and Facilities) Regulations ( 
S.I. No. 84 of 2010) as amended by the Oireachtas (Allowances) (Amendment) 
Regulations (S.I. No. 196 of 2023) is amended- 

(a) 

in subparagraph (1) by substituting “to the member a sum not 
exceeding €25,000, save for in exceptional circumstances as may 
be determined at the discretion of the Oireachtas Commission 
after consideration of a report of a Crime Prevention Officer 
(CPO)” for “on a once-off basis to the member a sum not 
exceeding €5,000, or 50% of their total costs, whichever is the 
lesser,” 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

18 December, 2024. 

PASCHAL DONOHOE, 

Minister for Public Expenditure, National Development 
Plan Delivery and Reform. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 27th December, 2024.
